DOC.brief_summary: A single-center retrospective chart review AdVance AdVance XP subject data , combine prospective follow-up subject confirm continence , adverse event , quality life status . This study include patient previously implant AdVance AdVance XP male sling .
DOC.brief_title: AMS AdVance AdVance XP Male Sling Systems Treatment Stress Urinary Incontinence Following Prostatectomy : Evaluation Safety , Efficacy , Quality Life Through Retrospective Chart Review Prospective Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: A single-center retrospective chart review AdVance AdVance XP subject data , combine prospective follow-up subject confirm continence , adverse event , quality life status . This study include patient previously implant AdVance AdVance XP male sling .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Valid , write informed consent obtain 2 . Male subject ≥40 year age receive AdVance male sling January 1 , 2010 AdVance XP male sling July 1 , 2010 treatment post prostatectomy SUI 3 . Pad use 1 8 pad per day prior sling placement ( subject use dry prophylactic pad safety liner baseline include ) 4 . External ( distal ) sphincter contractility coaptive zone ≥ 1cm confirm endoscopic view prior sling placement 5 . Primary etiology SUI result radical prostatectomy include , simple open prostatectomy , robotic laparoscopic prostatectomy 1 . Pad use 8 pad per day prior sling placement incontinence management 2 . Urine loss lie bed prior sling placement 3 . Treatment urethral sling system , AMS Sphincter 800® , implant device treatment urinary incontinence ( include bulk agent ) prior sling placement 4 . TURP procedure prior sling placement 5 . Urge predominant incontinence prior sling placement 6 . Past current neurological disorder ( e.g . neurogenic bladder , multiple sclerosis , Parkinson 's disease ) 7 . History connective tissue autoimmune condition 8 . Past current condition compromise immune system 9 . Placement inflatable penile prosthesis ( IPP ) sling placement 10 . Post void residual > 50 ml prior sling placement
